module.name: package
module.keywords: module, electrical component, electronic component, piece part, package, package properties, mounting technology, lead form, seating plane, terminal, connection zone, functional orientation, physical orientation, datum, package body, shape, shape properties, simulation, analysis

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the package view of a component that is part of the assembly. The package view is commonly understood in the electronics industry to be the mechanical container container view of the component, as opposed to the electrical functional view of the component. The shapes of the component including both as delivered to a manufacturer and as delivered to a customer are provided. A common identifier for the shape of the package and placement orientation alignment information between 2 dimensional and 3 dimensional models is provided. The information needed to allow industry or enterprise groups to populate explicit models and define associated properties and associated categories for standard packages and their versions is provided. The context of this module is related to electrical or electronic design and is not related to logistics or shipping.

inscope.li: physical shape properties of a component used in electrical design;
physical mounting method used in manufacturing process of attaching the component to a substrate in the assembly;
shape classification of the leads of a component;
simulation of the default mounting surface for a component shape model;
identification and characterization of leads of a component;
identification and characterization of areas on lead of a component that are allowed attachment zones;
orientation marks on components accessible by human or vision systems for assembly orientation;
computer based orientation identification using standard feature classification system;
shape classification and representation of the body of a component;
definition of shape properties of a lead template for use in multiple components;
items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Part feature function, ISO/TS 10303-1712.

outscope.li: non shape properties of an electrical component.

definition.def: a model of an item for which there is some internal physical structure available to support detailed thermal or mechanical evaluation but insufficient detail for manufacture
a model of an item for which there is not internal physical structure available to support detailed thermal or mechanical evaluation or manufacture
